title: Coronation Street spoilers: Dying Sinead bids farewell to her family
text:
Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) was left devastated several weeks back in Coronation Street when she learned that her cancer had returned and that, this time, it’s terminal. With only a few weeks left to live, the young woman starts making her final preparations in the coming episodes, and she bids farewell to those closest to her.

Since learning that her cancer had returned, Sinead has done everything she can to enjoy what little time she’s got left. She was further devastated in recent episodes when, after a visit to the oncologist, she learned that she only has a few weeks left to live — something which she later relayed to her friends and family during Ken’s (William Roache) 80th birthday party.

Sinead’s determined to spend as much time as possible with husband Daniel (Rob Mallard) and child Bertie, but her friends and family are also determined to lend a helping hand in making her short time all the more special in the coming episodes, as Coronation Street has revealed that Beth (Lisa George), Kirk (Andrew Whyment) and Craig (Colson Smith) will attempt to give Sinead one final Christmas.

However, Daniel insists Sinead is simply too ill for such a thing, but Sinead disagrees, thinking that it’s the best idea ever. She’s determined to enjoy what little time she’s got left, but it seems as if Daniel’s overprotectiveness could cause problems.

As a result, Daniel breaks down in the ginnel, where he’s comforted by Bethany (Lucy Fallon). Matters are made worse, as Daniel returns home to find Sinead’s read Bethany’s short story — and now believes that Bethany is in love with him. Daniel insists that this simply isn’t the case, but Sinead doesn’t believe him.

Will Daniel come clean?

Sinead’s pleased when she wakes to hear her family arguing over silly things, while Adam (Sam Robertson) finds a drunk Daniel in the ginnel — will he able to make him see sense before it’s too late?

Later, the Barlow and Tinker clans congregate in The Rovers, and proceed to share their favourite memories of Sinead. They all smile fondly as they reminisce — that is, until Beth takes a call from Daniel.

But what does Daniel have to say?

Coronation Street returns on Wednesday 16th October at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
